Appvity is committed to providing access to our website and mobile apps to people with disabilities. To meet this commitment, we strive to design and maintain our web pages and apps in conformance with WCAG 2.1, Level AA standards.
Support key accessibility features include, but are not limited to:
  1. Appropriate site structure for use with assistive technologies.
  2. Appropriate text equivalents for images.
  3. Appropriate labels for forms and input fields.
  4. Full keyboard access.
  5. Captioning for videos.
  6. Proper color contrast ratios for text and images with text.
If you are having trouble using this site or our mobile app because of a disability, contact us at support (at) appvity (dot) com.
